description: This is the marked COATV trail in a Simcoe county forest atv'ing is permitted with OFATV  pass. There are trails for hiking dirt-biking, snowshoeing and mountain biking in this forest as well. The forest is full of long rows of pines, mostly sandy and dirt ground. The GPS file is the marked atv trail and if atving on it you will require a pass!!!
directions: South on centerline road from HWY 26 east of Stayner Ontario.
title: COATV lawden trail
